artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Woman in white gown with a green and white striped overgown and a green hat with black trim, a red interior, and one green and one pink plume; this individual plate is a duplicate of the plate found in the bound fashion periodical of the same name P.15,201-P.15,203
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate I from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingt-unième Cahier, 10 Juin 1787
